payload.content: Digital platforms, such as LinkedIn, have historically controlled user data and presented it in a way that serves their own interests, rather than the user's.

name: Digital platforms, such as LinkedIn, have historically controlled user data and
content: Digital platforms, such as LinkedIn, have historically controlled user data and presented it in a way that serves their own interests, rather than the user's.

payload.content: AI can break the data asymmetry that has characterized platform relationships for the past 20 years.

name: AI can break the data asymmetry that has characterized platform relationships fo
content: AI can break the data asymmetry that has characterized platform relationships for the past 20 years.

payload.content: To gain control over your data and ask questions relevant to your own interests, export your data from platforms and feed it to AI.

name: To gain control over your data and ask questions relevant to your own interests,
content: To gain control over your data and ask questions relevant to your own interests, export your data from platforms and feed it to AI.

payload.content: AI can reveal insights from platform data that platforms themselves do not show, including: filtered views optimized for platform metrics, relationship half-life models indicating decaying connections, vouch scores predicting advocates, and warm path discovery for targeting companies.

name: AI can reveal insights from platform data that platforms themselves do not show,
content: AI can reveal insights from platform data that platforms themselves do not show, including: filtered views optimized for platform metrics, relationship half-life models indicating decaying connections, vouch scores predicting advocates, and warm path discovery for targeting companies.

payload.content: The ability to export data and use AI to analyze it represents the first genuine shift in power from platforms to individuals, particularly for professionals in the job market.

name: The ability to export data and use AI to analyze it represents the first genuine
content: The ability to export data and use AI to analyze it represents the first genuine shift in power from platforms to individuals, particularly for professionals in the job market.
